code: import{getAddress}from"@ethersproject/address";import BigNumber from"bignumber.js";BigNumber.config({EXPONENTIAL_AT:1e9});export var isMetaMaskInstalled=function isMetaMaskInstalled(){return typeof window.web3!=="undefined";};export var toWei=function toWei(amount){var decimals=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:18;try{if(!amount){return new BigNumber(0).toString();}return new BigNumber(amount).multipliedBy(new BigNumber(10).exponentiatedBy(decimals)).toFixed(0).toString();}catch(error){console.log("exeption in toWei , ",error);return null;}};export var fromWei=function fromWei(amount){var decimals=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:18;console.log("amount",amount);try{if(!amount){return new BigNumber(0).toString();}return new BigNumber(amount).div(new BigNumber(10).exponentiatedBy(decimals)).toString();}catch(error){console.log("exeption in fromWei ",error);return null;}};export var isNumber=function isNumber(value){return!isNaN(parseInt(value));};export function isAddress(value){try{return getAddress(value);}catch(_unused){return false;}}export var imageWithAndHeight=function imageWithAndHeight(providedFile){var imageDimentions={width:null,height:null};return new Promise(function(resolve){var reader=new FileReader();reader.readAsDataURL(providedFile);reader.onload=function(){var img=new Image();img.src=reader.result;img.onload=function(){imageDimentions.width=img.width;imageDimentions.height=img.height;resolve(imageDimentions);};};});};
